item.Name: multiply force by attached object speed

_field_real.name: normal force strength#force strength perpendicular to shape surface, positive pushes out, negative pulls in{force strength}
tangent force strength#force strength tangent to shape surface and aligned to particle velocity
binormal force strength#force strength binormal to shape surface and perpendicular to particle velocity
max speed#maximum speed from attached object that optionally gets normalized and multiplied with the force
